resources.string: Here are some tips that help with stress:
Focussing on your breathing can reduce your stress levels. Maybe our breathing exercise will help.
To help with your exam anxiety we have the following options
- Don´t be scared if it feels like you’re doing it wrong, there is nothing to do wrong
- Start with a few deep breaths to calm the body
- Make sure to breathe naturally during meditation
- Before you start: create a meditative space for yourself and get comfortable there
To see some funny jokes, tap on the Jokes button. To see relaxing/funny images tap on the Images button:

- Relax your neck and shoulders while doing the breathing exercises. 

- Choose a comfortable seated position, for example laying down or sitting comfortable

 - Breathe in and out through your nose

 - Close your eyes and relax your face 

 - Keep your breath slow and steady while breathing out

 - Wear comfortable clothes

 - Keep your spine straight and avoid straining the body

string-array.name: jokes
string-array.item: What do you call a fake noodle?\n An impasta!
What do you call cheese that isn`t yours?\n Nacho Cheese.
What does a baby computer call it`s father?\n Data!
Why did the golfer change his pants?\n Because he got a hole in one!
How do you make holy water?\n You boil the hell out of it.
What do you get when you cross a snowman with a vampire?\n Frostbite.
What`s at the bottom of the ocean and shivers?\n A nervous wreck!
Why don`t they play poker in the jungle?\n Too many cheetahs.
When is your door not actually a door?\n When it`s actually ajar.
